Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I was able to improve my work in some way through Gen AI but it can't replace the feedback from a teacher as that is more thorough and directional.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from AI made me sceptical and frustrated in a sense that I am not always sure if the model understands what I mean because it does not have contextual understanding. Feedback from the teacher made me feel more relaxed and in control of my improvement

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback from Gen AI is definitely good when working on the prototypes of your assessment to get a different perspective of how you could approach the scenarios. But the feedback from the teacher is holistic in some manner and has subjective elements that help in improving further
